title: Value Addition and Product Diversification in Coffee

questions.question: What is the primary goal of value addition in the coffee industry?
choices: To increase the volume of coffee produced
To increase the economic value of coffee products
To reduce the cost of coffee production
To eliminate the need for coffee processing
questions.answer: To increase the economic value of coffee products

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically considered a coffee by-product?
questions.answer: Green coffee beans

questions.question: What is cascara?
choices: The dried skins of coffee cherries
questions.answer: The dried skins of coffee cherries

questions.question: Which factor does NOT typically contribute to a coffee's specialty status?
questions.answer: Packaging design

questions.question: What is the main purpose of branding in the coffee industry?
choices: To increase the caffeine content of coffee
To differentiate products in the market
questions.answer: To differentiate products in the market

questions.question: Which of the following is a key consideration when designing packaging for export markets?
choices: Using only local languages on the packaging
Ensuring the packaging meets international standards
questions.answer: Ensuring the packaging meets international standards

questions.question: What is coffee flour primarily made from?
questions.answer: Dried coffee cherry pulp

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically an element of effective packaging design?
questions.answer: Weight of the packaging material

questions.question: What is the main benefit of developing specialty coffee products?
questions.answer: Increased market value

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a common use for coffee by-products?
questions.answer: Building materials

questions.question: What does the term 'value addition' mean in the context of coffee production?
choices: Increasing the price of coffee arbitrarily
Enhancing the economic value through processing or marketing
questions.answer: Enhancing the economic value through processing or marketing

questions.question: Which factor is most important when developing a new coffee-based product for the local Timorese market?
choices: Considering local cultural significance and flavors
questions.answer: Considering local cultural significance and flavors

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of creating a unique brand name for a coffee product?
choices: To make the product more expensive
To create brand recognition and loyalty
questions.answer: To create brand recognition and loyalty

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT typically included in coffee product packaging information?
choices: Names of the farmers who grew the coffee
questions.answer: Names of the farmers who grew the coffee

questions.question: What is the main challenge when developing new coffee-based products in Timor-Leste?
questions.answer: Limited market access

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential benefit of using coffee by-products?
questions.answer: Reduced environmental impact

questions.question: What role does packaging play in the coffee industry?
choices: It only protects the coffee during shipping
It has no impact on consumer perception
It communicates brand values and product information
questions.answer: It communicates brand values and product information

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical consideration when developing a specialty coffee product?
questions.answer: Maximizing production volume

questions.question: What is the primary difference between packaging for local markets versus export markets?
choices: Export packaging must meet international standards and regulations
Local packaging is always more expensive
questions.answer: Export packaging must meet international standards and regulations

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential use for coffee cherry pulp?
choices: As a flavoring for soft drinks
As a substitute for cocoa in chocolate production
As a coloring agent for textiles
questions.answer: As a flavoring for soft drinks

questions.question: What is the main advantage of developing coffee-based products beyond traditional brewed coffee?
choices: It reduces the need for quality control
It diversifies income streams for producers
It eliminates the need for coffee roasting
questions.answer: It diversifies income streams for producers

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical step in developing a new coffee-based product?
questions.answer: Ignoring consumer feedback

questions.question: What is the primary purpose of creating a logo for a coffee brand?
choices: To make the packaging more colorful
To increase the cost of production
To create a visual identity for the brand
questions.answer: To create a visual identity for the brand

questions.question: Which of the following is a key factor in successful branding for coffee products?
choices: Using as many colors as possible in the design
questions.answer: Consistency across all brand elements

questions.question: What is the main benefit of using local ingredients in coffee-based products in Timor-Leste?
choices: It always results in lower production costs
It supports the local economy and adds authenticity
It eliminates the need for quality control
questions.answer: It supports the local economy and adds authenticity

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical specialty coffee product?
questions.answer: Instant coffee powder

questions.question: What is the primary goal of product diversification in the coffee industry?
choices: To reduce the quality of coffee products
To create new revenue streams and market opportunities
To increase the workload for coffee farmers
questions.answer: To create new revenue streams and market opportunities

questions.question: Which of the following is a potential challenge when introducing new coffee-based products in Timor-Leste?
choices: Oversaturation of the market with similar products
Lack of coffee production in the country
Consumer resistance to trying new products
questions.answer: Consumer resistance to trying new products

questions.question: What role does sustainable packaging play in coffee product development?
choices: It has no impact on consumer choice
It can enhance brand image and appeal to environmentally conscious consumers
It is only important for low-quality coffee products
questions.answer: It can enhance brand image and appeal to environmentally conscious consumers

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a typical consideration when designing packaging for a coffee product?
questions.answer: Competitor's production volumes
